changeSet.author: test rrr
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `settlement_wallet` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `balance` decimal(15,2) DEFAULT 0, `role` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `wallet_id` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `created_at` date DEFAULT NOW(), `updated_at` date NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
